name: fnaf1-linux
description: a fnaf port into linux using electron and node.js

scripts.postinstall: sudo cp scripts/fnaf1 /usr/bin ; sudo mkdir /usr/share/fnaf1 ; sudo cp -r src /usr/share/fnaf1 ; sudo cp pack* /usr/share/fnaf1 ; sudo cp *js /usr/share/fnaf1/ ; sudo cp data/fnaf.desktop /usr/share/applications/ ; sudo cp -r data/icons /usr/share/fnaf1/

author: NEOLabs-software
